location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire Residency to Captain Charles Sealy, Commander of the HC Cruizer Aurora and Senior Marine Officer in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Captain that his requisition for cash has been completed, and that it will be dispatched to Bassidore [Bāsaʻīdū] aboard the HC Cruizer Nautilus.It further conveys a request from the Resident to have a cruizer meet him at Bahrain early in February 1825, as the Resident intends to continue with his tour of the Arabian coast; he specifically requests that the Nautilusis dispatched if available.
